titleStmt.title: the ioy of the iust vvith the signes of such. A discourse tending to the comfort of the deiected and afflicted; and to the triall of sinceritie. Being the enlargement of a sermon preached at Black-Friers London; on Psal. 95. 11. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Fulke Clifton dwelling on New-Fish-street Hill at the signe of the Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The iust mans ioy.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.

place.placeName: New-Fish-street Hill at the signe of the Lambe
